view

Class MineFinderHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.MineFinderHeader

  • public class MineFinderHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Header View that displays the current state of the game. Displays the number of bombs remaining, the current time, the game mode, and the current difficulty. Includes a reset button to reset the game. Reset button can be styled to match the state of the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steven Proctor
